item.title: Rocket.chat Server Setup on Reverse Proxy with SSL
item.description: Rocket.Chat is web chat server, with client for a wide range of platforms, including Android and iOS. It allows individuals, communities and companies to build and maintain their own chat platforms, without relying on third-party services. The highlight features of Rocket.Chat are: Videoconferences Voice messages Native and mobile applications Filesharing Preview of links from popular sites (e.g. Facebook, Youtube) Hardware Minimum hardware requirements to run a Rocket.Chat server are: * CPU: single core, with a clock of at least 2 GHz * Memory: 1 GB * Storage: 30 GB
